text: The 2000 Belgian Supercup was a football match between the winners of the previous season's Belgian First Division and Belgian Cup competitions. The match was contested by Cup winners Genk, and 1999–2000 Belgian First Division champions, Anderlecht on 5 August 2000 at the ground of the league winners Anderlecht, Het Kuipje. Prior to the game, the clubs agreed to allow more substitutions, leading to Anderlecht making six changes at halftime and seven in total during the game. Anderlecht won the match by three goals to one, winning its fifth Belgian Super Cup, while for Genk it marked the third loss in three years. ==Details== {| style width=92% |- | | |} {| style="width:100%" |style="vertical-align:top; width:50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||1|| Filip De Wilde || || |- |CB ||16 || Bertrand Crasson |- |CB ||6|| Lorenzo Staelens || || |- |CB ||5 || Glen De Boeck (c) |- |LW ||7 || Bart Goor || || |- |CM ||15 || Besnik Hasi |- |CM ||11 || Alin Stoica || || |- |CM ||10 || Walter Baseggio || || |- |RW ||21 || Emmanuel Pirard |- |CF ||8 || Jan Koller || || |- |CF ||13|| Tomasz Radzinski || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |CM ||4 || Yves Vanderhaeghe || || |- |LB ||9 || Didier Dheedene || || |- |CM ||14 || Patrick van Diemen || || |- |CF ||20|| Zvonko Milojević || || |- |CM ||22 || Oleg Yashchuk || || |- |GK ||23 || Zvonko Milojevic || || |- |CF ||26|| Aruna Dindane || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Aimé Anthuenis |} |style="vertical-align:top"|300px |style="vertical-align:top; width:50%"| {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-size:90%; margin:auto" |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||1|| Jan Moons |- |RB ||2 || Wilfried Delbroek |- |CB ||3|| Domenico Olivieri (c) |- |CB ||4 || Didier Zokora |- |LB ||13 || Akram Roumani || || |- |RM ||7 || Mike Origi |- |CM ||10 || Josip Skoko |- |CM ||14 || Bernd Thijs|| |- |LM || || Blessing Kaku || || |- |CF ||8 || Wesley Sonck |- |CF ||20|| Zoran Ban || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |RM ||12 || Thomas Chatelle || || |- |GK || || István Brockhauser || || |- |RB || || Fritz Emeran || || |- | || || Céderic Van der Elst || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Johan Boskamp |} |} ==See also== *1999–2000 Belgian First Division *1999–2000 Belgian Cup ==References== Belgian Super Cup, 2001 Category:Belgian Supercup Category:R.S.C.
